original_text: And he shall stand before Eleazar the priest, who shall ask counsel for him after the judgment of Urim before the Lord: at his word shall they go out, and at his word they shall come in, both he, and all the children of Israel with him, even all the congregation.
korean_text: 그는 제사장 엘르아살 앞에 설 것이요 엘르아살은 그를 위하여 우림의 판결로써 여호와 앞에 물을 것이며 그와 온 이스라엘 자손 곧 온 회중은 엘르아살의 말을 따라 나가며 들어올 것이니라

sentences.original_text: And he shall stand before Eleazar the priest
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 엘르아사르 제사장 앞에 설 것이요

sentences.original_text: who shall ask counsel for him
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그를 위하여 자문을 구할 것이며

sentences.original_text: after the judgment of Urim before the Lord
at his word shall they go out
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 말에 따라 그들이 나갈 것이요

sentences.original_text: and at his word they shall come in
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 말에 따라 그들이 들어올 것이며

sentences.original_text: and all the children of Israel with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 함께 있는 이스라엘 모든 자손이
